name: rotoré
description:
Complete the challenges on each level to open the exit door to the next one! Enjoy this relaxing game while not losing focus on every step you take!

Controls:

- WASD, Arrows: Move your die

- Mouse: Menu interactions

Credits:

- Art, design and programming: Michael Woo

- Music: Lo-Fi Chillout Music For Games by Saurabh Chaudhary

- SFX: The GOAT Kenney!

--------------

Thank you for playing the game! I hope you enjoyed it as much as I did making it :)
